description:
The Morpeko that has settled down in the Rocket Gang`s hideout is a massive glutton that`s even eating Musashi`s cakes and the food Kojiro hid. The Rocket Gang attempt to release it back to the wild, but Kojiro finds his relation with Morpeko ends in capturing it.
Source: wikipedia

titles.title: おねがい! モルペコゲットして!!
